Key Match Events: Axar Patel made a crucial catch
Mitchell Marsh was caught by Axar Patel
Hardik Pandya bowled a crucial final over
Pre-Game Insights: Australia won the toss and chose to bowl first
India set Australia 206 runs to win
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma was awarded Player of the Match
Mitchell Marsh praised India's performance and acknowledged their own team's shortcomings
Miscellaneous Highlights: India set up a semi-final match against England
Australia will wait to see if they can qualify for the semi-finals based on the outcome of the match between Afghanistan and Bangladesh
